Share information
Cube Storage Pioneers

Little Robots, Big Business

Since its inception in 1996, AutoStore™ has worked to improve warehouse efficiency. Today, the company’s key value proposition is to deliver an easy-to-use software powered cubic automatic storage and retrieval ecosystem.

The AutoStore solution is modular and flexible, and can automate any warehouse. The system offers a superior customer value proposition across operating metrics, ESG scores, and customer economics.
‍

View video to learn more

Our Legacy

The Cube Storage Pioneers
Since 1996

Wasted space is a thing of the past thanks to the ingenious foresight of engineers from a small Norwegian village. Find out how it all started and what AutoStore has planned for the future of order fulfillment.
